AboutComponent.title: About me
AboutComponent.subtitle: A bit about who I am
AboutComponent.content:
I am a Web Developer passionate about transforming ideas into innovative and efficient solutions. Since early on, technology has fascinated me and motivates me to solve problems with creativity and expertise.

My passion translates into intuitive and responsive web interfaces, built with React, Typescript, and Docker, always prioritizing best practices. I love integrating artificial intelligence, geographic data, and APIs (Python/Node.js) to create unique experiences.

I am proactive, autonomous, and love challenges! I actively contribute to team success, communicating clearly and empathetically. I believe in collaborative environments and knowledge sharing.

Code quality is fundamental to me. That's why I apply automated tests and SOLID principles in every project. I'm also a fan of Figma and Geotechnology, besides being familiar with PHP, Java, and C#.

My achievements include 3rd place at FECEG with an innovative web project, recognition as a standout student at ETEC, creating robots to automate tasks, and leading the refactoring of a Javascript application to Typescript. I was awarded 5 times as a company highlight, reflecting my commitment to excellence.

If you're looking for a resilient professional with team spirit and focused on results, who is always seeking new challenges and learning opportunities, count on me!

header.title: My Tech Stack
header.subtitle: Technologies I've been working with recently

projects.aiPersonalCoach: AI Personal Coach is an application that transforms personal goals into structured plans with automatic refinement via AI. Users describe personal goals simply and rely on a specialized coaching chatbot to refine, structure, and detail each goal, elevating clarity and organization for personal development.
projects.githubBlog: Github Blog is an application developed during Rocketseat's Ignite React Challenge 03. The goal is to consume the Github API to list publications (issues) from a repository, display details of each publication, and allow searching for posts.
projects.igniteShop: An e-commerce application developed. Features include product browsing, shopping cart functionality, and Stripe payment integration. Test the payment system using card number 4242 4242 4242 4242 with any future expiration date.
projects.coffeeDelivery: Coffee Delivery is a fictional e-commerce application for selling coffee, where users can select coffees, add them to cart, fill in delivery address, and choose payment method. Project developed as a challenge for Rocketseat Ignite.
projects.moveit: Moveit is a gamified application designed to help those of us who spend long hours in front of the computer and often forget to exercise.
projects.ignews: A blog platform with Stripe payment integration for subscriptions. You can test the payment system using the test card number 4242 4242 4242 4242 with any future expiration date.

ContactPage.description: For any questions, please send me a <link>message!</link>
